title: Elton John Unveils Details For New Album 'Wonderful Crazy Night'
text:
Elton John Unveils Details For New Album 'Wonderful Crazy... Elton John Unveils Details For New Album 'Wonderful Crazy Night' Elton John 
Check out the brand new single 'Looking Up'. 
Elton John is set to return with an exciting new album of upbeat, driving anthems in the form of 'Wonderful Crazy Night', and he makes the announcement alongside the release of first single 'Looking Up', out today (October 22nd 2015). Elton John announces 'Wonderful Crazy Nights' 
The record will be the legendary rockstar's 33rd full-length release and will follow 2013's 'The Diving Board' which hit number 3 in the UK Albums chart. Returning to co-production duties is T-Bone Burnett, who worked on 'Wonderful Crazy Night' at Los Angeles' The Village studio. It follows his work on the 2013 album, as well as Elton's collaborative album with Leon Russell 'The Union'. 
More: Read our review of 'The Diving Board' 
As usual, Elton John has brought in a number of other trusted musical partners to help put this album together, talented artists such as songwriter Bernie Taupin - with whom he has been working since the 60s - drummer Nigel Olsson and guitarist Davey Johnstone, among many others. 
First single 'Looking Up' is the seventh track on the album, and will be available as a free instant download to all who pre-order the album. It's a thrillingly uplifting tune featuring a toe-tapping rhythm characteristic of Elton, some rocking riffs and truly incredible piano work. 
More brilliant new compositions will also arrive in the form of 'A Good Heart', 'Tambourine' and 'The Open Chord', not to mention the banging self-titled opening salvo. 
More: Listen to new single 'Looking Up' 
Elton John is, without question, one of the best-selling musicians in history, having sold more than 300 million records in his career. His single 'Candle in the Wind 1997' still reigns as the top selling single in the UK and US, and his list of achievements is staggering; six Grammys, five Brits, one Oscar, one Golden Globe and a Tony. 
'Wonderful Crazy Night' is set for release on February 5th 2016 through Virgin EMI Records. Contactmusic
